scripts.updateSandbox: cd dist && echo ${PWD} && akamai sandbox update-edgeworker 4692 fashionstore.tgz
scripts.buildOld: rm -rf fashionstore.tgz && tar -czvf fashionstore.tgz main.js router.js handler.js client.js c8qls.js bundle.json && npm run updateSandbox
scripts.prebuild: echo 'Pass a valid C8_API_KEY in the client.js file. Ignore if already done.'
scripts.postbuild: npm run makeTarball && npm run updateSandbox
